title: KI muss sterben. Über die Entstehung und Beherrschung Künstlicher Superintelligenz

speakers.name: Max Haarich
speakers.description: Max Haarich is an artistic researcher, conceptual artist, and ambassador of the Lithuanian artist republic Užupis. He combines arts and tech to challenge predominant paradigms and explore unthinkable ideas. His current focus lies on the social implications of Artificial Intelligence.
